texts.name: Yaverr
texts.biography: When Kastore came to the throne of Deyja, many Undeads, as yet hiding in shadows, blatantly opposed the new authority. Yaverr, once hunting Harmondale's peasants alone, happened to be a very talented commander among the rebels.

specialty.name: Werewolves
specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Werewolves and Dire Werewolves for each level attained after 4th level. Additionally, Werewolves and Dire Werewolves get a permanent +1 Speed bonus
